Description: Sales Consultant / Interior DesignerPrevious furniture retail experience is recommended.Skills
Skills: - Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in furniture retail sales.
- Bachelor’s Degree in Interior Design or related discipline / Visual Merchandising.
- Utilizes strong interpersonal skills, selling skills, active listening, and professional attitude, and represents the company with integrity and professionalism.
- Offers superior customer service and cultivates relationships with clients & develops future business utilizing effective selling skills.
